modules.description: This module manages a pool of database connections in MirageOS unikernels, supporting operations like acquiring and releasing connections for PGX-based drivers. It provides functions to use a connection safely within a scoped operation, query the current pool size, and drain all connections when needed. Concrete use cases include handling concurrent database queries in a memory-efficient way and ensuring proper resource cleanup in long-running MirageOS services.

This module implements database connection management for MirageOS unikernels, specifically supporting PGX-based drivers. It provides functions to establish individual connections, run operations within a connection scope, and create connection pools with customizable post-connect initialization. Use cases include efficiently handling concurrent database access in MirageOS services while ensuring resource safety and proper cleanup.

This module provides functions to establish database connections within MirageOS unikernels, specifically supporting the PGX protocol. It works with Lwt for asynchronous I/O and MirageOS-compatible database drivers. Use it to integrate database access directly into MirageOS-based applications, such as embedding PostgreSQL queries in a unikernel-based web server.
